text: Dryalos (Δρύαλος) or Dry (Δρυ) is a village in the municipal unit of Oitylo, Laconia, Peloponnese, Greece. A nearby hilltop, 300 meters high, is named "Kastro tis Orias" ("Castle of the Fair Maiden"),Cf. Kastro tis Orias (disambiguation). and is sometimes given as the site of the medieval castle the Grand Magne, but it has no remains of a castle.J. M. Wagstaff, "Further Observations on the Location of Grand Magne", Dumbarton Oaks Papers 45:141-148 (1991) , p. 143-144. ==Notes== ==External links== * Official site Category:Populated places in Laconia Category:Populated places in the Mani Peninsula
title: Dryalos
